trans-unit.source: Specifies an Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) public key for use with the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Especifica una clave pública Diffie-Hellman de curva elíptica (ECDH) que se utiliza con la clase <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCngPublicKey> objects are used in key exchanges with <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCngPublicKey> los objetos se utilizan en los intercambios de claves con <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng> objetos.

trans-unit.source: Gets the key BLOB format for a <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCngPublicKey" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el formato BLOB de clave para un objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCngPublicKey" />.

trans-unit.source: The format that the key BLOB is expressed in.
trans-unit.target: Formato en el que se expresa el BLOB de clave.

trans-unit.source: Exports the key and explicit curve parameters used by the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECCurve" /> object into an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECParameters" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Exporta la clave y parámetros de curva explícitos que usa el objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECCurve" /> en un objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECParameters" />.

trans-unit.source: The key and explicit curve parameters used by the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECCurve" /> object.
trans-unit.target: La clave y parámetros de curva explícitos que usa el objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECCurve" />.

trans-unit.source: The method cannot obtain curve values.
trans-unit.target: El método no puede obtener valores de curva.

trans-unit.source: Explicit export is not supported by this platform.
trans-unit.target: Esta plataforma no admite la exportación explícita.

trans-unit.source: Windows 10 or higher is required.
trans-unit.target: Se requiere Windows 10, o bien versiones posteriores.

trans-unit.source: Exports the key used by the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECCurve" /> object into an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECParameters" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Exporta la clave que usa el objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECCurve" /> en un objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECParameters" />.

trans-unit.source: The key and named curve parameters used by the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECCurve" /> object.
trans-unit.target: La clave y parámetros de curva con nombre que usa el objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECCurve" />.

trans-unit.source: If the key was created as a named curve, the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECParameters.Curve?displayProperty=nameWithType> field contains named curve parameters; otherwise, it contains explicit parameters.
trans-unit.target: Si la clave se creó como una curva con nombre, la <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECParameters.Curve?displayProperty=nameWithType> campo contiene parámetros con nombre curva; en caso contrario, contiene parámetros explícitos.

trans-unit.source: The method cannot obtain curve values.
trans-unit.target: El método no puede obtener valores de curva.

trans-unit.source: A byte array that contains an Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) public key.
trans-unit.target: Matriz de bytes que contiene una clave pública Diffie-Hellman de curva elíptica (ECDH).

trans-unit.source: An object that specifies the format of the key BLOB.
trans-unit.target: Objeto que especifica el formato BLOB de clave.

trans-unit.source: Converts a byte array that contains a public key to a <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCngPublicKey" /> object according to the specified format.
trans-unit.target: Convierte una matriz de bytes que contiene una clave pública en un objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCngPublicKey" /> según el formato especificado.

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the ECDH public key that is serialized in the byte array.
trans-unit.target: Objeto que contiene la clave pública ECDH que se serializa en la matriz de bytes.

trans-unit.source: This static method is shared among all <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCngPublicKey> instances.
trans-unit.target: Este método estático se comparte entre todas las <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCngPublicKey> instancias.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="publicKeyBlob" /> or <paramref name="format" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: El parámetro <paramref name="publicKeyBlob" /> o <paramref name="format" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="publicKeyBlob" /> parameter does not contain an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellman" /> key.
trans-unit.target: El parámetro <paramref name="publicKeyBlob" /> no contiene ninguna clave <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellman" />.

trans-unit.source: An XML string that contains an Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) key.
trans-unit.target: Cadena XML que contiene una clave Diffie-Hellman de curva elíptica (ECDH).

trans-unit.source: Converts an XML string to an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCngPublicKey" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Convierte una cadena XML en un objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCngPublicKey" />.

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the ECDH public key that is specified by the given XML.
trans-unit.target: Objeto que contiene la clave pública ECDH especificada por el XML determinado.

trans-unit.source: This static method is shared among all <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCngPublicKey> instances.
trans-unit.target: Este método estático se comparte entre todas las <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCngPublicKey> instancias.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="xml" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: El parámetro <paramref name="xml" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="xml" /> parameter does not specify an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellman" /> key.
trans-unit.target: El parámetro <paramref name="xml" /> no especifica ninguna clave <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellman" />.

trans-unit.source: Converts the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCngPublicKey" /> object to a <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Convierte el objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCngPublicKey" /> en un objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey" />.

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the key represented by the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCngPublicKey" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Objeto que contiene la clave representada por el objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCngPublicKey" />.

trans-unit.source: Serializes the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCngPublicKey" /> public key to an XML string in RFC 4050 format.
trans-unit.target: Serializa la clave pública <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCngPublicKey" /> en una cadena XML en formato RFC 4050.

trans-unit.source: An XML string that contains the serialized <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCngPublicKey" /> public key.
trans-unit.target: Cadena XML que contiene la clave pública <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCngPublicKey" /> serializada.

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECKeyXmlFormat.Rfc4050?displayProperty=nameWithType> for information about the XML format that this method uses.
trans-unit.target: Consulte <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECKeyXmlFormat.Rfc4050?displayProperty=nameWithType> para obtener información sobre el formato XML que utiliza este método.
